.
Jurisdiction of Special Allowance Claims
The Philadelphia Pension Management Center (PMC) has the sole authority to make awards and payments of the special allowance under
38 U.S.C 1312(a)
.
Development of special allowance claims is the responsibility of the regional office (RO) with original jurisdiction.
